code: @GetMapping(value = "/pets/{id}") public Map<String, String> petById(@PathVariable("id") Integer id) {     if (id != null && id > 0 && id <= PETS.length + 1) {         int index = id - 1.         String pet = PETS[index].         return Collections.singletonMap("name", pet).     } else {         return Collections.emptyMap().     } }
